entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 26. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 16 May 2016
